remarks: Homomorphisms preserve spans.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lmhmlsp.v $e |- V = ( Base ` S ) $.
lmhmlsp.k $e |- K = ( LSpan ` S ) $.
lmhmlsp.l $e |- L = ( LSpan ` T ) $.
lmhmlsp $p |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ U C_ V ) -> ( F " ( K ` U ) ) = ( L ` ( F " U ) ) ) $.
